casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Wade Larry COLE. No. 324A94-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2005. A. Danielle Marquis, Special Deputy Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Wade Larry Cole) shall have up to and including the 4th day of May 2005 to file his/her Petition for Writ of Certiorari with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of March 2005."
